description.p: Available options for defining a diagonal border for an Office::Format.

item.name: *[xb:Office::borderDiagonal::DiagonalDown]*
item.description: Value = 1. A diagonal border from the upper-left corner to the bottom-right corner of a cell.

item.name: *[xb:Office::borderDiagonal::DiagonalUp]*
item.description: Value = 2. A diagonal border from the bottom-left corner to the upper-right corner of a cell.

item.name: *[xb:Office::borderDiagonal::DiagonalBoth]*
item.description: Value = 3. Include both a DiagonalDown and DiagonalUp border.
